What percentage of funds go to miners or stakers when an ID is created?

100% of all funds that are not paid to referrers go to miners or stakers of the blockchain. This means that any funds not allocated to referrers are distributed to those who maintain the blockchain, ensuring its security and integrity.

- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s referrer’s referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the miner of the block in which the ID is mined100% of all funds that are not paid to referrers go to miners or stakers of the blockchain.## To create an identity:
